ActDBValidation.Description: check for flow entry with status as pass
ActDBValidation.SQL: select count(*) from EXECUTIONDETAILS where CALENDARNAME="{VBS Eval=mid("{Var Name=BF_CALENDER_ROW_DATA}",InStr("{Var Name=BF_CALENDER_ROW_DATA}","HEADER/$/")+Len("HEADER/$/"),InStr(mid("{Var Name=BF_CALENDER_ROW_DATA}",InStr("{Var Name=BF_CALENDER_ROW_DATA}","HEADER/$/")+Len("HEADER/$/"),100),"/$/")-1)}" AND TESTSCENARIO_STATUS="PASS" AND TESTSCENARIONAME = "{VBS Eval=mid("{Var Name=BF_CALENDER_ROW_DATA}",InStr("{Var Name=BF_CALENDER_ROW_DATA}","FLOW_NAME/$/")+Len("FLOW_NAME/$/"),InStr(mid("{Var Name=BF_CALENDER_ROW_DATA}",InStr("{Var Name=BF_CALENDER_ROW_DATA}","FLOW_NAME/$/")+Len("FLOW_NAME/$/"),100),"/$/")-1)}" order by ACTIVITYDATE DESC

ActInputValue.StoreToVariable: select count(*) from EXECUTIONDETAILS where CALENDARNAME="{VBS Eval=mid("{Var Name=BF_CALENDER_ROW_DATA}",InStr("{Var Name=BF_CALENDER_ROW_DATA}","HEADER/$/")+Len("HEADER/$/"),InStr(mid("{Var Name=BF_CALENDER_ROW_DATA}",InStr("{Var Name=BF_CALENDER_ROW_DATA}","HEADER/$/")+Len("HEADER/$/"),100),"/$/")-1)}" AND TESTSCENARIO_STATUS="PASS" AND TESTSCENARIONAME = "{VBS Eval=mid("{Var Name=BF_CALENDER_ROW_DATA}",InStr("{Var Name=BF_CALENDER_ROW_DATA}","FLOW_NAME/$/")+Len("FLOW_NAME/$/"),InStr(mid("{Var Name=BF_CALENDER_ROW_DATA}",InStr("{Var Name=BF_CALENDER_ROW_DATA}","FLOW_NAME/$/")+Len("FLOW_NAME/$/"),100),"/$/")-1)}" order by ACTIVITYDATE DESC
ActInputValue.Value: select count(*) from EXECUTIONDETAILS where CALENDARNAME="{VBS Eval=mid("{Var Name=BF_CALENDER_ROW_DATA}",InStr("{Var Name=BF_CALENDER_ROW_DATA}","HEADER/$/")+Len("HEADER/$/"),InStr(mid("{Var Name=BF_CALENDER_ROW_DATA}",InStr("{Var Name=BF_CALENDER_ROW_DATA}","HEADER/$/")+Len("HEADER/$/"),100),"/$/")-1)}" AND TESTSCENARIO_STATUS="PASS" AND TESTSCENARIONAME = "{VBS Eval=mid("{Var Name=BF_CALENDER_ROW_DATA}",InStr("{Var Name=BF_CALENDER_ROW_DATA}","FLOW_NAME/$/")+Len("FLOW_NAME/$/"),InStr(mid("{Var Name=BF_CALENDER_ROW_DATA}",InStr("{Var Name=BF_CALENDER_ROW_DATA}","FLOW_NAME/$/")+Len("FLOW_NAME/$/"),100),"/$/")-1)}" order by ACTIVITYDATE DESC
